com.tikal.jenkins.plugins.multijob.Multi.description: WARNING: THIS IS AN AUTO-GENERATED JOB DEFINITION. CHANGES MADE USING THE ONLINE EDITOR WILL NOT BE HONORED. MAKE CHANGES TO THE JOB DEFINITIONS IN THE openshift/aos-cd-jobs REPOSITORY INSTEAD.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_STORAGE_DRIVER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The storage driver to use when configuring the cluster. 'overlay2' and 'devicemapper' are allowed.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_IMAGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The image to install the cluster with. If set, defaults to the value defined by the cluster/bin/local.sh script.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ADDITIONAL_SKIP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Regular expression to filter additional tests from the conformance suite. See also:
openshift-ansible pull 3017
origin issue 12361
origin issue 12362
origin issue 12784
origin issue 12629
origin issue 11016
kubernetes issue 40953
origin issue 12072
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: |should provide DNS for services|should support subPath|should work with TCP \(when fully idled\)|should test kubelet managed /etc/hosts file|\[networking\]\[router\]|Downward API volume should update annotations on modification|should run a deployment to completion and then scale to zero|Basic StatefulSet functionality Scaling down before scale up is finished should wait until current pod will be running and ready before it will be removed|Probing container should \*not\* be restarted with a /healthz http liveness probe

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ORIGIN_TARGET_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch in the origin repository to test against.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ORIGIN_PULL_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The pull-request in the origin repository to test.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RELEASE_TARGET_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The branch in the release repository to test against.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi latest="$( readlink "${HOME}/origin-ci-tool/latest" )" touch "${latest}" cp "${latest}/bin/activate" "${WORKSPACE}/activate" cat >> "${WORKSPACE}/activate" <<EOF export OCT_CONFIG_HOME="${WORKSPACE}/.config" EOF
source "${WORKSPACE}/activate" mkdir -p "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}" rm -rf "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}/origin-ci-tool" oct configure ansible-client verbosity 2 oct configure aws-client 'keypair_name' 'libra' oct configure aws-client 'private_key_path' '/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/devenv.pem'

hudson.plugins.descriptionsetter.Descrip.description:
Using PR ${ORIGIN_PULL_ID} merged into the origin ${ORIGIN_TARGET_BRANCH} branch.
Using the release ${RELEASE_TARGET_BRANCH} branch.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: USE A RAMDISK FOR ETCD ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: USE A RAMDISK FOR ETCD ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi { cat <<EOF sudo su origin set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" sudo mkdir -p /tmp sudo mount -t tmpfs -o size=2048m tmpfs /tmp sudo restorecon -R /tmp EOF } | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: FORWARD PARAMETERS TO THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: FORWARD PARAMETERS TO THE REMOTE HOST ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo chmod o+rw /etc/environment ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_IMAGE=${OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_IMAGE:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'ADDITIONAL_SKIP=${ADDITIONAL_SKIP:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'JOB_NAME=${JOB_NAME:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'BUILD_NUMBER=${BUILD_NUMBER:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'DOCKER_STORAGE_DRIVER=${DOCKER_STORAGE_DRIVER:-}' >> /etc/environment"

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: MOVE SECRETS TO REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: MOVE SECRETS TO REMOTE HOST ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi rsync --copy-links --omit-dir-times --archive --rsh "ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config" /var/lib/jenkins/.gce/* openshiftdevel:/data/src/github.com/openshift/release/cluster/test-deploy/data/ ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel 'sudo chown -R origin:origin-git /data/src/github.com/openshift/release/cluster/test-deploy/data/' ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel 'sudo chmod -R ug+rwX /data/src/github.com/openshift/release/cluster/test-deploy/data/'

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: PROVSION TEST CLUSTER ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: PROVSION TEST CLUSTER ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi { cat <<EOF sudo su origin set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/release" cd cluster/test-deploy/data/ if [[ -n "\${OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_IMAGE}" ]]; then docker pull "\${OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_IMAGE}" docker tag "\${OPENSHIFT_ANSIBLE_IMAGE}" "openshift/origin-gce:latest" fi
# we need a short but unique identifier, so we take the first 7 of SHA hashed_identifier="\$( echo "\${JOB_NAME}" | sha1sum )" export INSTANCE_PREFIX="prtest-\${hashed_identifier:0:7}-\${BUILD_NUMBER}"
function cleanup() { cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/release/cluster/test-deploy/data" # we need a short but unique identifier, so we take the first 7 of SHA hashed_identifier="\$( echo "\${JOB_NAME}" | sha1sum )" export INSTANCE_PREFIX="prtest-\${hashed_identifier:0:7}-\${BUILD_NUMBER}" ../../bin/local.sh ansible-playbook playbooks/terminate.yaml } trap cleanup ERR
../../bin/local.sh ansible-playbook -e "provision_gce_docker_storage_driver=\${DOCKER_STORAGE_DRIVER}" -e "openshift_test_repo=\${location_url}" playbooks/launch.yaml cp admin.kubeconfig /tmp/cluster-admin.kubeconfig EOF } | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: RUN EXTENDED TESTS ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: RUN EXTENDED TESTS ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi { cat <<EOF sudo su origin set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/origin" mkdir -p /tmp/artifacts/junit export KUBECONFIG=/tmp/cluster-admin.kubeconfig export PARALLEL_NODES=25 export EXTENDED_TEST_PATH=test/extended export TEST_ONLY=1 export JUNIT_REPORT=true export TEST_EXTENDED_SKIP="\[local\]" TEST_EXTENDED_SKIP+="\${ADDITIONAL_SKIP-}" export GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS="/data/src/github.com/openshift/release/cluster/test-deploy/data/gce.json" export TEST_EXTENDED_ARGS='-provider=gce -gce-zone=us-central1-a -gce-project=openshift-gce-devel-ci'
function gather() { set +e hack/build-go.sh cmd/oc export PATH=\$(pwd)/_output/local/bin/linux/amd64:\$PATH oc get nodes --template '{{ range .items }}{{ .metadata.name }}{{ "\n" }}{{ end }}' | xargs -L 1 -I X bash -c 'oc get --raw /api/v1/nodes/X/proxy/metrics > /tmp/artifacts/X.metrics' '' set -e } trap gather ERR
function cleanup() { cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/release/cluster/test-deploy/data" # we need a short but unique identifier, so we take the first 7 of SHA hashed_identifier="\$( echo "\${JOB_NAME}" | sha1sum )" export INSTANCE_PREFIX="prtest-\${hashed_identifier:0:7}-\${BUILD_NUMBER}" ../../bin/local.sh ansible-playbook playbooks/terminate.yaml } trap cleanup EXIT
make test-extended SUITE="conformance" EOF } | ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: DOWNLOAD ARTIFACTS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: DOWNLOAD ARTIFACTS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ARTIFACT_DIR="$( pwd )/artifacts" rm -rf "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" mkdir "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" if ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo stat /tmp/openshift; then ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo chmod -R o+rX /tmp/openshift scp -r -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel:/tmp/openshift "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" fi if ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo stat /tmp/artifacts; then ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo chmod -R o+rX /tmp/artifacts scp -r -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel:/tmp/artifacts "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" fi tree "${ARTIFACT_DIR}"

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: GENERATE ARTIFACTS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: GENERATE ARTIFACTS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ARTIFACT_DIR="$( pwd )/artifacts/generated" rm -rf "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" mkdir "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "sudo docker version && sudo docker info && sudo docker images && sudo docker ps -a 2>&1" >> "${ARTIFACT_DIR}/docker.info" || true ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "sudo yum list installed 2>&1" >> "${ARTIFACT_DIR}/installed_packages.log" || true ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "sudo ausearch -m avc 2>&1" >> "${ARTIFACT_DIR}/avc_denials.log" || true tree "${ARTIFACT_DIR}"

#!/bin/bash echo "########## STARTING STAGE: FETCH SYSTEMD JOURNALS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: FETCH SYSTEMD JOURNALS FROM THE REMOTE HOST ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ARTIFACT_DIR="$( pwd )/artifacts/journals" rm -rf "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" mkdir "${ARTIFACT_DIR}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo journalctl --unit docker.service --no-pager --all --lines=all >> "${ARTIFACT_DIR}/docker.service" tree "${ARTIFACT_DIR}"
